rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with storage and cloakroom.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open plan living area combined with kitchen, central courtyard view.

rooms.name: open_plan_kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped Mediterranean style open-plan kitchen adjacent to living room, with ample counter space and modern appliances.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Separate dining area integrated within the living room area, designed for family gatherings.

rooms.name: home_office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space located in a quiet corner of the ground floor with natural light and views to the courtyard.

rooms.name: guest_room
rooms.description: Guest bedroom with ensuite bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Master bedroom with walk-in closet and attached bathroom, designed for relaxation.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Main bathroom for ground floor use with modern fixtures.

openings.details: Double door entrance to accommodate entry of vehicles and pedestrians.
Large windows overlooking the central courtyard for natural light and views.
Skylight above kitchen area to enhance brightness and energy efficiency.
